item.description:
Happy Halloween!

 

The guys at Old School in New Haven have graciously opened their place to our crazy gang of ghouls.

 

They are bringing in a DJ and Karaoke just for us, in addition we’ll have the soulful styles of our very own Captain Tom.

 

Come in costume and we just might have a prize for you! Come as yourself if you so desire and we’ll still welcome you with open arms.

 

We are starting at 6 and ending when it ends, we hope to have a ghostly good time.

 

There will be appetizer and drink specials provided by the haunted staff of Old School.

 

Don’t miss this event – last year was a hoot, and this year we expect even more craziness! Come celebrate and enjoy the night with your favorite ghosts and goblins.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Halloween Party @ Olde School Saloon and Bistro
